workflow.name: Automate launch intelligence with Hacker News, Asana, GPT & Slack/Email digests
workflow.description:
## üìò Description
This workflow automatically detects new product launches posted on Hacker News under ‚ÄúShow HN,‚Äù evaluates their launch strength, converts each launch into a tracked Asana task, and generates a clean daily founder digest delivered via Slack and email.
The system runs on a daily schedule, fetches recent Show HN posts directly from Hacker News, filters for real launch signals, extracts structured launch metadata, and scores each launch based on engagement indicators such as points, comments, and context. Every detected launch is immediately logged as an actionable Asana task with full context for follow-up.
All launches are then aggregated and analyzed by an AI engine that produces two outputs: a compact, skimmable Slack digest and a structured, email-ready launch briefing grouped by signal strength. Any workflow failure triggers a real-time Slack alert with diagnostic details.
This workflow replaces manual Hacker News monitoring, launch tracking, task creation, and digest writing with a fully automated launch intelligence and execution pipeline.

## ‚öôÔ∏è What This Workflow Does (Step-by-Step)
‚è∞ Trigger Daily Show HN Launch Scan
 Runs automatically on a daily schedule.
üì∞ Fetch Recent Show HN Posts from Hacker News
 Pulls the latest ‚ÄúShow HN‚Äù posts using native Hacker News data.
üîç Filter Likely Product Launch Announcements
 Scans titles and descriptions for launch indicators such as:
 ‚Ä¢ Launch
 ‚Ä¢ Beta
 ‚Ä¢ v1
 ‚Ä¢ API
 ‚Ä¢ Platform
 ‚Ä¢ Tool
üß† Normalize Launch Metadata and Score Signal Strength
 Extracts and structures:
 ‚Ä¢ Product name
 ‚Ä¢ Description
 ‚Ä¢ Product URL
 ‚Ä¢ Hacker News discussion link
 ‚Ä¢ Author and publish date
 ‚Ä¢ Points and comments
 Assigns launch strength (High / Medium / Low).
üìã Create Asana Task for Detected Product Launch
 Creates a follow-up task with:
 ‚Ä¢ Full launch context
 ‚Ä¢ Engagement metrics
 ‚Ä¢ Signal strength
 ‚Ä¢ Direct links
 ‚Ä¢ Auto-assigned due date
üì¶ Aggregate Launch Items for Digest Generation
 Combines all detected launches into a single dataset for analysis.
üß† Generate Daily Founder Launch Digest (AI)
 Creates:
 ‚Ä¢ A Slack-ready daily launch summary
 ‚Ä¢ A clean, structured, email-ready digest
 ‚Ä¢ Grouped by launch signal strength
üß† LLM Reasoning Engine for Launch Digest
 Ensures clarity, structure, and readability across outputs.
üîÑ Parse Digest Output into Slack and Email Payloads
 Separates AI output into delivery-ready formats.
üì£ Send Daily Founder Launch Digest to Slack
 Posts the daily launch summary to Slack.
üìß Send Daily Founder Launch Digest via Email
 Delivers an inbox-optimized version of the launch digest.
üö® Error Handler Trigger ‚Üí Slack Alert
 Any workflow failure sends a detailed Slack alert with node name, error message, and timestamp.
üß© Prerequisites
 ‚Ä¢ Hacker News API access (n8n HN node)
 ‚Ä¢ Asana OAuth credentials
 ‚Ä¢ Azure OpenAI API credentials
 ‚Ä¢ Slack API credentials
 ‚Ä¢ Gmail OAuth credentials
 ‚Ä¢ n8n schedule trigger enabled

## üí° Key Benefits
 ‚úî Detects real product launches automatically
 ‚úî Scores launch strength using engagement signals
 ‚úî Converts launches into actionable Asana tasks
 ‚úî Produces clean Slack and email digests daily
 ‚úî Eliminates manual Hacker News monitoring
 ‚úî Maintains consistent launch intelligence flow
 ‚úî Provides instant error visibility via Slack

## üë• Perfect For
-  Startup founders
-  Product scouts and VC analysts
-  Growth and partnerships teams
-  Innovation and market research teams
-  Anyone tracking early-stage product launches without manual effort

workflow.name: Hacker News Launch Tracker & Asana Task Manager (Show HN Intelligence)

nodes.name: Create Asana Task for Detected Product Launch
Fetch Recent Show HN Posts from Hacker News1
Trigger Daily Show HN Launch Scan
Normalize Launch Metadata and Score Signal Strength
Aggregate Launch Items for Digest Generation

parameters.text:
=You are given an array of Hacker News launch items.

Each item contains:
- title
- product_name
- description
- url
- hn_item_url
- points
- num_comments
- launch_signal_strength

TASK:

1. Create a Slack message with:
   - Header: "üöÄ Daily Hacker News Launch Digest"
   - Bullet list of launches
   - Each bullet must include:
     ‚Ä¢ Product name
     ‚Ä¢ Short one-line description (max 12 words)
     ‚Ä¢ Signal strength (High / Medium / Low)
     ‚Ä¢ Hacker News link
   - Keep Slack output compact and skimmable

2. Create an EMAIL DIGEST that is CLEAN and EMAIL-READY.

EMAIL FORMAT RULES (STRICT):
- Use clear section headers:
  üî¥ High Signal Launches
  üü° Medium Signal Launches
  üîµ Low Signal Launches
- Add a blank line between every product
- Each product MUST follow this structure exactly:

Product Name:
What it is:
Why it matters:
Product Link:
Hacker News Link:

- Keep each field to 1‚Äì2 short lines
- Do NOT combine products into a paragraph
- Do NOT remove line breaks

OUTPUT RULES:
- Return ONLY valid JSON
- No explanations
- No markdown fences

Return JSON in this exact structure:
{
  "slack_message": "...",
  "email_digest": "..."
}

Here is the input data:
{{ JSON.stringify($input.all().map(i => i.json), null, 2) }}

options.systemMessage:
=You are a founder-communications assistant.

You specialize in creating clean, well-formatted Slack messages and
executive-ready email digests.

Formatting rules:
- Use clear section headers
- Use line breaks between sections
- Never write long paragraphs
- Optimize for readability in email clients
- Output must look good in Gmail and Slack
- Avoid wall-of-text formatting

nodes.name: LLM Reasoning Engine for Launch Digest
Parse Digest Output into Slack and Email Payloads
Send Daily Founder Launch Digest to Slack
Send Daily Founder Launch Digest via Email

parameters.content:
## üöÄ Hacker News Launch Tracker & Asana Task Manager (Show HN Intelligence)

This workflow automatically scans Hacker News ‚ÄúShow HN‚Äù posts every day
to detect new product launches, evaluate their launch strength, and
convert them into actionable founder insights.

The automation fetches recent Show HN posts, filters for real launch
signals, enriches each item with structured metadata, and scores the
launch based on engagement signals like points and comments.

Each detected launch is immediately logged as an Asana task for tracking,
while all launches are aggregated into a clean daily digest. An AI engine
then generates a Slack-ready summary and a structured email digest,
allowing founders and teams to stay updated on emerging products without
manually monitoring Hacker News.

## ‚è∞ Daily Show HN Monitoring
Controls when and how new launch data is collected.

‚Ä¢ Trigger Daily Show HN Launch Scan  
  Runs the workflow automatically on a daily schedule.

‚Ä¢ Fetch Recent Show HN Posts from Hacker News  
  Pulls the latest ‚ÄúShow HN‚Äù posts directly from Hacker News
  using native HN data.

## üîç Launch Signal Detection
Identifies which posts represent real product launches.

‚Ä¢ Filter Likely Product Launch Announcements  
  Scans titles and descriptions for launch-related keywords
  (launch, beta, v1, API, platform, tool).

‚Ä¢ Normalize Launch Metadata and Score Signal Strength  
  Extracts product name, description, links, author, and engagement.
  Assigns a launch signal strength (High / Medium / Low).

## üìã Launch Tracking & Aggregation
Tracks launches and prepares data for digest creation.

‚Ä¢ Create Asana Task for Detected Product Launch  
  Creates a follow-up task with full launch context
  (product, author, links, engagement, signal strength).

‚Ä¢ Aggregate Launch Items for Digest Generation  
  Combines all detected launches into a single dataset
  for daily digest generation.

## üß† Founder Digest Generation
Transforms raw launch data into founder-friendly insights.

‚Ä¢ Generate Daily Founder Launch Digest (AI)  
  Creates:
  - A compact Slack launch digest
  - A clean, structured email digest
  - Grouped by launch signal strength

‚Ä¢ LLM Reasoning Engine for Launch Digest  
  Provides the AI reasoning model that ensures
  clarity, structure, and readability.

## üì£ Digest Distribution
Delivers insights to founders and teams.

‚Ä¢ Parse Digest Output into Slack and Email Payloads  
  Separates AI output into Slack and email-ready formats.

‚Ä¢ Send Daily Founder Launch Digest to Slack  
  Posts the daily launch summary directly to Slack.

‚Ä¢ Send Daily Founder Launch Digest via Email  
  Delivers an email-friendly version for inbox consumption.

## üö® Error Handling 

 
Catches any workflow failure and posts an alert to Slack.  
Includes node name, error message, and timestamp for quick debugging.

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

generic.label: How a digital strategist uses n8n for online marketing

data.details: In n8n, when a workflow execution fails, it can start another workflow. This second workflow can be any arbitrary workflow on your n8n instance. Use the Error Trigger node as your Trigger in the Error workflow.
